name: esri-react-prerender
description: Boilerplate for a project that pre-renders it's React components and also uses Esri's JavaScript 4.0 Beta and ES6.

scripts.start: gulp build && npm run jade-dev & npm run babel-dev & npm run stylus-dev
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && gulp dist && npm run optimize && npm run stylus && npm run jade
scripts.stylus-dev: mkdir -p build/css && stylus src/css/base.styl -l --watch & stylus src/css/app.styl -o build/css -l --watch
scripts.jade: npm run prerender && jade src/index.jade -O src/jade.json -o dist && rm src/jade.json
scripts.stylus: mkdir -p dist/css && stylus src/css/base.styl --compress && stylus src/css/app.styl -o dist/css --compress

author: https://github.com/Robert-W
